v1.0.0: Theme Maker is now managed at this separate repository, which gives access to publishing releases, changing repo description, etc. Automated scripts for building, publishing, and releasing future updates are written.
v1.1.0: Removed the PNG version of the Grass theme's background to greatly reduce build file size.
v1.1.1: Tweaked the opacity of the Cubistic template.
v1.1.2: Further adjustments to the Cubistic template.
v1.1.3: More adjustments to the Cubistic template.
v1.1.4: Hiding theme maker window now also hides the blur on narrower screens.
v1.2.0: Fixed an issue where some assets were not displaying correctly.
v1.3.0: * Updated the look of the menu sidebar to match the main site's new look.
* Updated the Spring Field template to match the main site.
* The website now refers to itself as `Theme Maker` instead of `Theme Maker of Zimo Web`.
v1.3.1: * Updated the look of the menu sidebar.
* Fixed an issue where a horizontal line in the menu sidebar is duplicated.
v1.3.2: Slightly updated the look of the menu sidebar.
v1.3.3: Further updated the look of the menu sidebar.
v1.3.4: Fixed an issue where the hide theme maker window setting does not disable interactions.
v1.4.0: Changed the `robot.txt` policy to allow everything.
v1.4.1: Fixed a minor issue in the rendering of favicon.
v1.4.2: Fixed another minor issue in the rendering of favicon.
v1.4.3: Fixed another issue in the rendering of favicon.
v1.5.0: * Added the optimize profile export setting.
* * Profiles can now be exported in an optimized format, at the cost of losing some data that might otherwise be useful for editing.
v1.5.1: * Made the Theme Maker window slightly bigger.
v1.6.0: * Reset settings button no longer resets profiles.
* A new reset profiles button has been added to specifically reset profiles.
v1.6.1: Changed the wording of the reset profiles button.
v1.6.2: Fixed some minor styling issues regarding the Theme Maker's window.
v1.7.0: Added the Bewitched theme and its animated background.
v1.7.1: Slightly adjusted the Bewitched theme animated background.
v1.7.2: Further adjustments to the Bewitched theme animated background.
v1.7.3: Further adjustments to the Bewitched theme animated background.
v1.7.4: Fixed an issue where some Theme Maker widgets are missing shadows.
v1.7.5: Fixed an issue where the dropdown menu's opening animation is not rendered correctly.
v1.8.0: Changed the rendering of a certain favicons that use backdrop gradient. It now attempts to use SVG rendering whenever possible.
v1.8.1: Slightly improved the check for the rendering method.
v1.8.2: Fixed an issue where some favicons rendered using the translation layer method do not appear correctly.
v1.8.3: Fixed an issue caused by the previous fix.
v1.8.4: Reworked the icons of Bubbles, Bewitched, and Gold theme for better consistency.
v1.8.5: Slightly tweaked the Halloween theme animated background.
v1.8.6: Re-release of the previous version to address some vulnerability.
v1.9.0: The import button now supports importing multiple profiles at once.
v1.9.1: Slight changes to the import button behavior.
v1.10.0: Added the Underwater theme and its animated background.
v1.10.1: Tweaked the underwater theme meta theme color.
v1.10.2: Further tweaked the underwater theme meta theme color.
v1.10.3: Fixed several minor issues in the gradient stops editor module.
v1.10.4: Improved the optimize profile export functionality.
v1.11.0: Added the prefer SVG rendering if possible to backdrop mode of the favicon configuration.
v1.11.1: Updated the type guard to reflect the recent changes.
v1.12.0: * Fixed an issue where the animated background of Sky, Storm, Pixelland, and Verdant theme does not render correctly on local sessions.
* Removed the animation of the sun in the Pixelland theme's animated background. This is done to fix the issue as mentioned.
v1.13.0: * Added the allow extended gradient setting.
* Removed the Penumbra theme's animated background.
* Added the circle radial gradient mode and interface.
* Added the Penumbra theme into the Theme Maker templates.
* Removed a few themes from the Theme Maker templates.
v1.13.2: Improved the dropdown widget in the Theme Maker.
